name: jp
description: It's just for demo perspective... Lets enjoy Automation

scripts.googleSearchTest: SEARCH_ENV=google BROWSER=chrome npx mocha UITest/google-search-engine-test.js --reporter mochawesome
scripts.bingSearchTest: SEARCH_ENV=bing BROWSER=chrome npx mocha UITest/bing-search-engine-test.js --reporter mochawesome
scripts.yahooSearchTest: SEARCH_ENV=yahoo BROWSER=chrome npx mocha UITest/yahoo-search-engine-test.js --reporter mochawesome

author: Jaimin Patel
